sourcesContent:
//JobsList.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { getJobs } from './utils/jobs_list/GetJobs.js' import { formatJobs } from './utils/jobs_list/FormatJobs.js' const JobsList = ({ jobs }) => { return (
{jobs.map(job => ( {/*target='_blank' opens link in new tab rel is for security*/} ))}
Company Position Date Status Location URL Actions
{job.company} {job.position} {job.date} {job.status} {job.location} link
); }; export default JobsList;
